"Equipping a Mag":
"Owning a Mag does nothing by itself. A Mag must be equipped to have an effect. To equip a Mag, open the list of Mags from the Main Menu, choose the Mag you wish to equip and select \"Equip Mag\".

When a Mag is equipped, it grants you various effects, such as stat boosts and support in combat.

When a Pet is equipped, your Mag is hidden, but its stats and support effects will still be received as usual."
"Your report has been accepted. The license application is also all in order. We look forward to your continued success."
"Well, now that we've got all the official stuff out of the way, let me add a few words of my own."
"Mags can think and act for themselves. Each one is unique, just like you and me, as they develop based on how their owner treats them."
"I don't know the specifics of how Mags evolve, but an ARKS operative would probably be able to tell you more."
"From here on in, your Mag will share your fate. Take good care of it."
